pages.text: Even after you place your rocket, you will not be able to fly just yet. To fly, you will need to fill the rocket with fuel.

pages.title: Obtaining Fuel
pages.text: Oil is found in large amounts spouting over the ocean surface. Collect as much oil as you can, as oil is non-renewable, and you need a lot of it for each rocket launch.

pages.title: Obtaining Fuel
pages.text: After collecting enough oil (at least six buckets for a launch and return), you will need to refine the oil into fuel. To do this, you will need to craft a fuel refinery. Power it, then place the oil in the left slot, and it will be refined into fuel.

pages.title: Fuel Refinery
pages.text: Shift-click on the rocket to open its inventory, then place three buckets of fuel into the input slot. Place the other three buckets into the rocket's inventory for a return trip.
